text: Nuko ubwo Musa yagarukaga mu bantu be arakaye afite n’agahinda, yaravuze ati “Ibyo mwasigaye mukora ntahari ni bibi! Ese mwashaka kwihutisha itegeko rya Nyagasani wanyu (musenga ibyo atabategetse)? Maze ajugunya hasi za mbaho, afata umusatsi wo ku mutwe w’umuvandimwe we arawukurura amwiyegereza. Haruna aravuga ati “Mwana wa mama! Mu by’ukuri abantu baransuzuguye, bandusha intege, ndetse bari hafi yo kunyica. Bityo, ntutume abanzi bankina ku mubyimba, kandi ntunshyire mu bantu b’inkozi z’ibibi.”
